team_gold_zork

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • team_gold_zork.Character
      • team_gold_zork.Player

  • class Player
extends Character
    This class stores attributes related to the adventurer.

      • restoreState

           throws IllegalSaveFormatException
        Restores the state of a player from a .sav file.
        Specified by:
        restoreState in class Character
        Parameters:
        s - the Scanner reading the .sav file.
        Throws:
        IllegalSaveFormatException - If the player description contains invalid contents.

      • addHunger

        void addHunger(int n)
        Modifies the player's hunger.
        Parameters:
        n - The number to add to the player's hunger. This number is negative if the hunger should diminish.

      • addFatigue

        void addFatigue(int n)
        Modifies the player's fatigue.
        Parameters:
        n - The number to add to the player's fatigue. This number is negative if the fatigue should diminish.

      • addDamage

        void addDamage(int n)
        Modifies the player's damage.
        Parameters:
        n - The number to add to the player's damage. This number is negative if the player is wounded and positive if the player is healed.

      • getHealthWarning

        java.lang.String getHealthWarning()
        Prints out the state of the player's health, if a threshold for damage, fatigue or hunger has been reached.
        Returns:
        the warning message associated with the player's health. If a threshold has not been reached, then it returns an empty string.

      • hasDied

        boolean hasDied()
        Determines whether the player has died.
        Returns:
        If the player has died.

      • hasWon

        boolean hasWon()
        Determines whether the player has won the game.
        Returns:
        Whether the player has won.

      • addScore

        void addScore(int n)
        Modifies the player's score.
        Parameters:
        n - The points added to the player's score. This number is negative if points should be subtracted.
